altTitles.ja: アイシールド21

description.en: Wimpy Sena Kobayakawa has been running away from bullies all his life. But when the American football gear comes on, things change–Sena's speed and uncanny ability to elude big bullies just might give him what it takes to become a great high school American football hero! Enjoy all the bone-crushing action and slapstick comedy that this heartwarming coming-of-age story has to offer.
description.pt-br: Sena foi um garoto fraco, magrelo e sem amigos durante toda sua infância, mas agora, no colegial, ele acaba de entrar para o colégio Deimon e querendo conseguir novos amigos decide participar de algum clube, mas não consegue decidir qual. Depois de um mal entendido com os valentôes do colégio, Sena acaba se integrando ao clube de futebol americano como secretário. Mas apó ver suas habilidades, Hiruma que é dono do clube, tem planos muito maiores para ele. Essa é a jornada de Sena através do mundo do futebol americano colegial japonês. Onde ele vai crescer desse garoto fraco e se tornar um grande jogador!

altTitles.ja: セブンゴースト

altTitles.th: เซเว่นโกสต์

description.en: Teased unmercifully for his past as an orphan and a slave, Teito has only his best friend Mikage to ease his days at the elite Barsburg Academy - and his mastery of the magical art of Zaiphon! But even that will not be enough to save him when he discovers a horrifying secret behind the ruling Empire. Trapped in an ancient battle between a wicked Death God and the Seven Ghosts and guided by three mysterious priests, Teito discovers a power that could save the world… and shed light on his own mysterious past.
description.ru:
Мир, похожий на наш. Тейто Кляйн - студент Священной военной академии Барсбургской Империи, чьи воспоминания до определенного времени попросту исчезли. О нем известно лишь то, что он был рабом из павшего королевства Раггс, а попасть в элитную школу ему удалось лишь благодаря владению "зайфоном" - энергией этого мира. Так, воспоминания, некогда оставившие Тейто, начали постепенно пробиваться в его снах, и после пропускного экзамена они вновь застают мальчишку не в самое выгодное время. Благодаря им Тейто вспоминает, что сильнейший из элитных военных главнокомандующий Аянами был тем, кто некогда убил его отца. Это воспоминание приводит Тейто к череде необычных событий, которые вскоре определяют его роль в истории. А выжить ему помогает Барсбургская церковь и три священника Фрау, Кастор и Лабрадор.

- [Wikipedia](https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/07-Ghost)

description.en: What happens when the greatest martial artist of the Murim world meets a genius magician from a fantasy world?
description.fr:
Que se passe-t-il quand le plus grand artiste martial du monde du Murim rencontre une magicienne de génie d'un monde fantastique ?  
  
**Links:**  
- [Naver blog de l'auteur](https://blog.naver.com/tdstudio)  
- [Webtoon Original ](http://page.kakao.com/home/48455145) (Raw) (KakaoPage)

title.en: Otaku ni Yasashii Gal wa Inai!?

altTitles.ja: オタクに優しいギャルはいない!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Otaku ni Yasashii Gyaru wa Inai!?
Otaku ni Yasashii Gyaru ha Inai!?

altTitles.en: Gal can’t be Kind to Otaku!?
Gals can't be Kind to a Geek!?

altTitles.zh: 没有辣妹会对阿宅温柔!?

altTitles.pt-br: Gal Não Pode ser Legal com Otaku!?

altTitles.vi: Gyaru không thể tử tế với Otaku ư?

description.en: Takuya Seo is an otaku who likes "anime for girls" and can't say he likes it out loud. One day, he hooks up with two gals from his class, Amane and Ijichi, but it seems that Amane is also an otaku...
description.ja: あまり大きな声で好きと言えない“女児向けアニメ”が好きなオタク 瀬尾卓也。ある日、クラスのギャル 天音さんと伊地知さんに絡まれたのだが、何やら天音さんもオタクの匂いが…？
description.vi: Một anh bạn trung bình Otaku thích anime dành cho bé gái, giáp mặt hai nàng Gyaru xinh đẹp nổi tiếng nhất trường. Nhưng không chỉ có thế, một trong hai nữ nhân xinh đẹp ấy có gì đó...hơi otaku thì phải...?
description.pt-br: Takuya Seo é um otaku que gosta de "animes para garotinhas" e não pode dizer isso em voz alta. Um dia, ele conversa com duas gals da sua sala, Amane e Ijichi, mas parece que a Amane também é uma otaku... Uma comédia romântica escolar onde o otaku conhece as gals que ele gosta!

altTitles.ja: ふしぎねこのきゅーちゃん

description.en:
There’s more to this kitty than meets the eye! Kyuu-chan loves snacks, cuddles, and bow ties, but most of all loves Hinata, the young professional who adopted this mischievous wonder cat into his home.

As the two adjust to life together, they discover that they have a lot to learn from each other.

The ordinary and the extraordinary live side by side in this delightful slice-of-life manga!

---

- **[Official English license announcement](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/2020/08/28/seven-seas-isnt-kitten-around-with-license-of-wondercat-kyuu-chan-manga-series/)**

- **[ManiManiTV YouTube channel](https://www.youtube.com/c/ManiManiTV/videos/), Official Kyuu-chan motion comic videos:** [#1,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zCBZUbEbI-w) [#2,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wSJURvGO494) [#3](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ytJbXHsqikw)…
description.ro: O manga adorabilă color despre un tânăr ce salvează o pisică foarte specială. Dar pisica asta nu e ceea ce pare! Kyuu-chan iubeste mâncarea, îmbrățișările și fundele, dar cel mai mult, îl iubește pe Hinata, tânărul care l-a adoptat. Pe măsură ce se obișnuiesc să trăiască împreună, ei descoperă că au mult de învățat unul de la celălalt. Vedeți viața ordinară și extraordinară pe care cei doi o trăiesc în această minunată slice-of-life manga pentru toți iubitorii de animale și nu numai!
description.ru: Милая история о повседневной жизни бездомного котика Кю и человека, который решает его приютить.
description.pt-br: Hinata é um jovem trabalhador que leva uma vida mundana. No meio de uma tempestade de neve, ele acha um gato abandonado passando frio em uma caixa de papelão, e decide o levar pra casa. O que Hinata não sabia é que ele tinha acabado de pegar o melhor gato de todos!

altTitles.en: A Classmate is a Princess Knight!
The Princess Knight is a Classmate!

altTitles.ja: 姫騎士がクラスメート! THE COMIC

altTitles.zh-hk: 公主騎士是我的同班同學! THE COMIC

description.en:
After he and his entire class died on a field trip, Odamori accepts a job offer from a mysterious man to be reincarnated. 

However, his new job turns out to be that of a Slavemancer, with the power to dominate the minds of others and turn them into his toys. Soon, however his evil actions lead to a Princess Knight (who turns out to be one of his previous, more popular classmates) being dispatched to apprehend him. 

But Odamori, of course, has something different planned for their reunion...!
description.pt: Depois que ele e toda a sua classe morreram em uma viagem escolar, Odamori aceita uma oferta de um misterioso homem de ser reencarnado. No entanto o seu novo trabalho acaba por ser o de um 'Slavemancer' com o poder de dominar as mentes dos outros e transformá-los em seus brinquedos, que ele alegremente aceita. Logo no entanto suas mÁs ações levam a uma princesa guerreira (que acaba por ser um de seus anteriores colegas mais populares) que está sendo enviada para prendê-lo. Mas Odamori, claro, tem algo diferente planejado para a sua reunião.
description.pt-br: Depois que ele e toda a sua classe morreram em uma viagem escolar, Odamori aceita uma oferta de um misterioso homem de ser reencarnado. No entanto o seu novo trabalho acaba por ser o de um 'Slavemancer' com o poder de dominar as mentes dos outros e transformá-los em seus brinquedos, que ele alegremente aceita. Logo no entanto suas mÁs ações levam a uma princesa guerreira (que acaba por ser um de seus anteriores colegas mais populares) que está sendo enviada para prendê-lo. Mas Odamori, claro, tem algo diferente planejado para a sua reunião.

title.en: Watashi no Kokoro wa Oji-san de Aru

altTitles.ja: 私の心はおじさんである

altTitles.en: My Heart Is an Old Man

description.en:
"Haruka Yamagishi" is a guy who has no friends or family and just goes back and forth between work and home. One day, when he wakes up, he finds himself in a different world. And for some reason, he's turned into a beautiful dark elf! Now, Haruka has inexhaustible magic power, a sturdy body, and a new life where she can do anything... However, through the friends she met and her activities as an adventurer, changes slowly began to take place. The guy who gave up on life in this world begins to feel what it's like to live. Although there are some traps and other events, it's a touching adventure story!

[Source: Manga updates]
description.es-la: "Haruka Yamagishi" es un tio que no tiene amigos ni familia y sólo va y viene entre el trabajo y su casa. Un día, cuando se despierta, se encuentra en un mundo diferente. Además, por alguna razón, ¡se ha convertido en una hermosa elfa oscura! Ahora, Haruka tiene un poder mágico inagotable, un cuerpo robusto y una nueva vida en la que puede hacer cualquier cosa....Sin embargo, a través de sus amigos que conoció y sus actividades como aventurera, poco a poco empezaron a surgir cambios.Al tio que renunció a la vida, en este mundo empieza a sentir lo que es vivir. Aunque hay algunas trampas y otros eventos, ¡Es una historia de aventuras conmovedora!

description.en: The handsome and affectionate pilot Zhou Jingze x the gentle and firm doctor Xu Sui. Summer is always hot, and so is the boy I love. Watch "Infatuated Prodigal Son" Zhou Jingze perform this role.
description.zh: 痞帅深情飞行员周京泽x温软坚定医生许随。夏天永远热烈，我爱的少年也是。看“痴情浪子”周京泽演绎这一份情有独钟。

altTitles.ja: シャイ

description.en: In the middle of the 21st century, the world was on the brink of World War III. But superheroes from across the globe appeared and helped bring an era of peace. With the crisis averted, the Heroes returned to their home countries where they now help with domestic matters. This is the story about the young Japanese heroine named "Shy"…
description.fr:
Au milieu du XXIe siècle, le monde était au bord de la troisième guerre mondiale. Mais des super-héros du monde entier sont apparus et ont contribué à l'avènement d'une ère de paix. La crise ayant été évitée, les Héros sont retournés dans leur pays d'origine où ils apportent désormais leur aide pour les affaires intérieures. C'est l'histoire de la jeune héroïne japonaise nommée « Shy »…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.id: Di pertengahan abad ke-21, dunia berada di ambang Perang Dunia ke III. Tapi pahlawan super dari seluruh dunia muncul dan membantu membawa era perdamaian. Bersamaan menghindari krisis, para Pahlawan kembali ke negara asal mereka di mana mereka sekarang membantu masalah-masalah dalam negerinya. Ini adalah kisah tentang pahlawan muda dari Jepang bernama "Shy"…
description.pt: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada "Shy"…
description.ru: В середине 21-го века мир был на гране третьей мировой войны. Но супер герои, появившиеся по всему миру, помогли принести в мир покой. Разобравшись с этим, герои вернулись в свои страны, где теперь помогают с местными проблемами. Эта же история о японской героини “Стесняшка”…
description.th: ในช่วงกลางศตวรรษที่ 21 โลกได้ตกอยู่ในยุคของสงครามโลกครั้งที่สาม แต่แล้วได้มีฮีโร่ปรากฏตัวขึ้นจากทั่วโลก และช่วยนำพายุคแห่งสันติภาพกลับคืนมา หลังจากวิกฤตได้ผ่านพ้นไป ฮีโร่แต่ละคนได้กลับไปยังประเทศบ้านเกิดของพวกเขา เพื่อช่วยเหลือภัยพิบัติที่เกิดขึ้นในของแต่ละประเทศของตัวเอง …นี่คือเรื่องราวเกี่ยวกับ สาวน้อยฮีโร่ชาวญี่ปุ่น ที่มีนามว่า "ฌาย"…
description.tr:
21. yüzyılın ortasında, dünya III. Dünya Savaşının eşiğindeydi. Süper kahramanlar dünyanın çeşitli yerlerinde ortaya çıktı ve barış çağını getirmeye yardımcı oldular. Kriz önlendiği için tüm kahramanlar kendi ülkelerine döndü ve iç meselelere yardım etmeye başladılar. Bu "SHY" adlı Japon Kadın Kahramanının hikayesi…?  


---

 Author's Twitter: [@bukimi397](https://twitter.com/bukimi397)
description.vi:
Vào giữa thế kỷ 21, trong số các anh hùng có mặt khắp nơi trên khắp thế giới xuất hiện một anh hùng siêu xấu hổ đến từ Nhật Bản với biệt danh là "Shy".
Cô gánh trên mình trách nhiệm của một anh hùng, mặc dù bản thân rất kém trong việc đối mặt với ánh mắt đến từ mọi người.
Dù gặp biết bao gian khó và khổ đau, nhưng Shy vẫn đứng lên vì những người xung quanh...! 
Không chỉ dừng ở những cuộc xung đột, SHY còn là câu chuyện về tình người, về sự đồng tâm hiệp lực của các anh hùng để cùng nhau tiến về phía trước!
Câu chuyện trưởng thành về anh hùng mang tấm lòng nhân ái!
description.es-la: A mediados del siglo 21, el mundo estaba al borde de la 3ra Guerra Mundial. Sin embargo, alrededor del mundo, héroes comenzaron a aparecer y ayudaron a traer la paz a esta era. Con esa crisis habiendo sido evitada, los héroes regresaron a sus paises de origen donde ahora ayudan con asuntos internos. Esta historia se trata de la joven heroína japonesa llamada "Shy"…

title.en: Destiny Unchain Online ~Kyuuketsu-ki Shoujo to natte, Yagate『Aka no Maou』to Yobareru You ni Narimashita~

altTitles.ja: Destiny Unchain Online 〜吸血鬼少女となって、やがて『赤の魔王』と呼ばれるようになりました〜

altTitles.en: Destiny Unchain Online: After Becoming a Vampire Girl, I Eventually Became Known as "Crimson Demon King"

altTitles.th: Destiny Unchain Online เดสทินี อันเชน ออนไลน์ ~เมื่อผมกลายเป็นสาวน้อยผีดูดเลือดแล้วถูกขนานนามว่าจอมมารสีชาด~

altTitles.zh: Destiny Unchain Online 〜成为吸血鬼少女，不久后被称为『红之魔王』〜

altTitles.ko: Destiny Unchain Online 데스티니 언체인 온라인 〜흡혈귀 소녀가 되어, 이윽고『붉은 마왕』이라 불리게 되었습니다〜

altTitles.vi: Destiny Unchain Online: Bị biến thành thiếu nữ ma cà rồng, tôi được biết đến với tên gọi "Xích Sắc Ma Vương"

description.en: Mitsuki Kou is such a feared PVP gamer that he's earned the nickname "Crim the Headhunter" in some circles. His next game to take over? "Destiny Unchain Online", a brand new VRMMO game developed by none other than Kou's father. But, no new game on release day is without its bugs - namely, Kou glitches to the middle of nowhere, and his vampire avatar is turned into a girl!  A story for all of the people who through games have met new friends and aimed for the top... start!
description.id: Mitsuki kou, seorang gamer dengan skill hebat yang memiliki nama lain,  yaitu "pemburu kepala Cream". Berpartisipasi dalam sebuah game baru "Destiny Unchain Online" yang dibuat oleh ayahnya sebagai tester perangkat game baru, tetapi segera setelah dimulai, karena sebuah bug ia menjadi gadis vampir. Ketika ia bertemu dengan teman-teman yang baik, pada saat itulah ia akan mulai menyelesaikan game, sebuah cerita tentang seorang gamer terbaik yang segala sesuatunya berubah…… sudah di mulai!
description.ja: 神がかったプレイヤースキルを持ち「首狩りクリム」の二つ名で知られるゲーマー、満月紅。父親が作った新作ゲーム『Destiny Unchain Online』に新型ゲームデバイスのテスターとして参加するが、開始早々バグだらけで姿は吸血鬼種族の少女に。最高の仲間と出会い、ゲームを攻略して行くうちに、何もかもが変わっていく最高のゲーマー物語……開幕！
description.ko: 압도적인 스킬을 가지고「목 사냥꾼 크림」이라는 별명으로 알려진 게이머, 미츠키 코우. 아버지가 만든 신작 게임 『Destiny Unchain Online』에 신형 게임 장치 테스터로 참가하지만, 시작하자마자 오류투성이로 흡혈귀 종족의 소녀가 되어 버리는데. 최고의 동료와 만나고, 게임을 공략해 나가다 보니,모든 것이 변해 가는 최강 게이머 이야기… 개막!
description.th: มิตสึกิ โค เกมเมอร์ฝีมือฉกาจที่รู้จักกันในนาม ‘คริมนักล่าหัว’ ได้เริ่มเล่นเกม ‘Destiny Unchain Online’ ที่พ่อของเขาสร้างในฐานะเทสเตอร์ของเครื่องเล่นเกมรุ่นใหม่ล่าสุด แต่ไม่ทันไรก็เจอบั๊กมากมายจนกลายเป็นเด็กสาวเผ่าผีดูดเลือดไปซะอย่างนั้น เรื่องราวของเกมเมอร์ผู้เก่งกาจที่ทุกอย่างเริ่มเปลี่ยนไปเมื่อได้พบกับพรรคพวกสุดเจ๋งและผจญภัยในโลกแห่งเกม... เปิดฉากแล้ว ณ บัดนี้!
description.vi: Kou Mitsuki là một game thủ với những kỹ năng phải nói là quá ghê gớm, có biệt danh là "Thợ săn táo Crim". Cậu tham gia thử nghiệm một thiết bị trò chơi mới cho trò chơi mới mà do chính cha của cậu tạo ra, "Destiny Unchained Online". Nhưng trò chơi đầy lỗi khi bắt đầu và phá vỡ giấc mộng trở thành nam ma cà rồng cool ngầu của cậu. Gặp gỡ những đồng minh tuyệt vời và bắt đầu cuộc chơi như vũ bão, câu chuyện về một game thủ hàng đầu nơi mà mọi thứ hay bất kì cái gì đều có thể thay đổi... bắt đầu!

altTitles.ja: アイツノカノジョ

altTitles.fr: La petite amie de ce mec

description.en: It's April of my third and final year in high school... But the beautiful girl I have a crush on is my best friend's girlfriend. Thus begins my year of treading on the dangerous ground...
description.pt-br: É abril do meu terceiro e último ano no ensino médio... Mas a linda garota por quem tenho uma queda é a namorada do meu melhor amigo. Assim começa meu ano pisando em um terreno perigoso...

title.en: The Lecture You Would Never Want Your Parents to Give You

altTitles.ja: 親に絶対されたくない説教

altTitles.fr: Le sermon que vous ne voudriez jamais recevoir de vos parents

altTitles.ru: Лекция, которую вы бы не хотели услышать от родителей

altTitles.vi: Bài Thuyết Giáo mà ta Không bao giờ Muốn nghe từ phụ Huynh

altTitles.es-la: El regaño que nunca quisieras recibir de tus padres
La charla que nunca quieres que te den tus padres.

altTitles.ja: マグメル深海水族館

description.en:
A tale about a modern deep-sea aquarium employee in Tokyo!  
  
What's living in the overwhelming darkness deep within the sea? Take a glimpse into this strange world about a boy working at a deep sea aquarium.

altTitles.ja: フルメタル・パニック!

description.en: Trouble always seems to follow the beautiful and sassy, Kaname Chidori. Though she is only a high-school student, Kaname is constantly the target of terrorism. Lucky for her though, the dreamy Sosuke, an undercover agent from Mithril, is one step behind her, ready to protect her at any cost. But will he be able to save her from harm every time she is in trouble?
description.es-la: Los problemas siempre parecen perseguir a la bella y atrevida Kaname Chidori. Aunque solo es una estudiante de preparatoria, Kaname es constantemente el blanco del terrorismo. Sin embargo, por suerte para ella, el soñador Sosuke, un agente encubierto de Mithril, está un paso detrás de ella, listo para protegerla a cualquier costo. Pero, ¿podrá salvarla del daño cada vez que esté en problemas?

description.en:
With her fierce eyes and sharp impression, and wary of everyone, 'Ahn Se-young' is a woman to watch out for.
Everyone is cautious around her, but a lone boy stands in front of her.
"I like you, go out with me!"
"......What?!"
Se-young is taken aback at the sudden confession of love, but this was just the beginning...
The tug-of-war between 'Ahn Se-young', who shows an unexpected side to her as you get closer, and 'Nam Ho-yeol', the straightforward guy who tries to break down her impenetrable facade, begins now!
description.ko:
사나운 눈매와 날카로운 인상으로 주변 사람들에게 경계를 받고 있는 요주의 그녀 '안세영'.
모두가 경계심을 놓지 못할 때 그녀의 앞에 한 남자애가 마주선다.
"나 너 좋아해, 나랑 사귀자!"
"......뭐?!"
난데없는 사랑고백에 진땀이 빠지는 세영, 하지만 이건 시작에 불과했으니...
가까이 다가갈수록 반전의 모습을 보이는 그녀 '안세영'과
그 모습을 빈틈없이 파고 들려는 직진남 '남호열'의 줄다리기가 지금 시작된다!

description.en:
Yi-jae transmigrated as Hailey, the daughter of the Duke, who threw herself in the water just before her royal wedding.

However, Yi-jae can see vengeful spirits that should not be visible behind the King!
Days continue as Yi-jae struggles to exorcise the vengeful spirits that flock around King Roderick.

As Roderick spends more time with Yi-jae, he starts to notice the odd changes in his mental and physical self as they clear…

altTitles.ja: ダイヤのA actⅡ

description.en: Eijun Sawamura had his heart set on the middle-school national baseball championships. But his team is eliminated thanks to a wild pitch thrown by Eijun himself. He’s planning to go to high school with his teammates and try again next year when he’s scouted by the famous Seido High School baseball team. When he goes for a campus visit, he finds himself on the receiving end of a baptism by fire! His experience forming a battery with up-and-coming catcher Miyuki rekindles his passion for baseball!!

altTitles.ja: ミスミさんは見透かせない

description.en: A romantic comedy about Yuri Tsuguto, who has clairvoyance but isn’t good at it, and Misumi Mitsuhashi, a girl who likes strange things. One day, when Yuri looks at Misumi’s back, he notices that her jacket is transparent and behind it is the message “If anyone can read this, come to the astronomy clubroom after school.” When he goes to the clubroom and explains his clairvoyance ability, Misumi becomes excited and asks “Why don’t you let me study you?”

altTitles.ja: 異剣戦記ヴェルンディオ

altTitles.es-la: Völundio: Saga de las espadas divergentes

altTitles.vi: Volundio - Sử thi về mộng kiếm

description.en:
On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern!

Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!
description.ja:
絶望の戦場で…酒場経営はじめます！

傭兵歴10年の男・クレオは
不思議な少女・コハクと出会う。
強大な力を持つ「異剣」が飛び交う
戦場を生き延びるために、
二人が始めたのは――
兵士たちが集う「酒場」の経営！？
description.es-la:
En un campo de batalla desesperado... ¡Empieza a dirigir una taberna!

Cleo, un hombre con 10 años de experiencia como mercenario
Conoce a una misteriosa chica llamada Kohaku.
Para sobrevivir en el campo de batalla donde vuelan las poderosas "otras espadas".
Lo que los dos empiezan a hacer es... Dirigir una "taberna" donde se reúnen los soldados.

description.en: During the era of space exploration, mankind is at war against monsters of unknown origin. The battle is grim, and the future looks bleak. Amidst the chaos, mankind plays their last hand. It's time for the Knights to step into the fray and turn the tide of this war.

altTitles.ja: 廃后のスキャンダル

description.en:
Lucentia is a woman who was forced to marry the emperor, but was accused of treason and beheaded. She managed to escape death thanks to a precognitive dream and fled to the enemy empire, where she became Rose Von Isaac, a rich and powerful merchant. But Lucentia could not escape her fate, as she was the only one who could save the Duke of Aytan, a legendary swordsman who had a secret that could change everything. She proposed that he be her guardian, but he asked her to be his lover.

Lucentia decided that she would no longer be manipulated by fate and that she would live her life as she wanted.

altTitles.ja: アンデッドアンラック
アンデッドアンラック カラー版

altTitles.vi: Bất tử và bất hạnh (Bản màu)

description.en: Fuuko is an UNLUCKY girl that causes bad luck to anyone she touches. As she prepares to face her death, Andy, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Realizing her potential, he decides to use Fuuko's power to gives himself a permanent death, but then a certain organization goes after them…

Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

altTitles.ja: ルシア

altTitles.th: ลูเซีย เจ้าหญิงผู้ถูกลืม

description.en:
Lucia grew up not knowing she was a princess. But when her mother died, she entered the palace and had the chance to see her entire future in a dream. In her dream, when she reached 19 years old, she was auctioned off to the bidder who offered the highest dowry. Her life became miserable from then on. When she woke up from her dream, she was determined to reshape her future, realizing that she had plenty of time before the crucial turning point. Thus, she begins her journey to change her dark future.

---

description.es:
Lucía creció sin saber que era ser una princesa. Pero cuando su Madre murió, ella entró en el palacio y tuvo la oportunidad de ver todo su futuro en un sueño. En su sueño, cuando tenía 19 años, la subastaron al licitador que ofreció la dote más alta. Su vida se volvió miserable a partir de ese momento. Cuando se despertó de su sueño, estaba decidida a cambiar su futuro, al darse cuenta de que tenía mucho tiempo antes del momento crucial. Así, comienza su viaje para cambiar su oscuro futuro.

description.fr:
Elle est la seizième princesse du royaume. Elle vit recluse et oubliée de tous. Un rêve va tout changer. Pour échapper à l’effroyable destin qui la guette, elle est prête à confier sa vie au plus terrible des lions.

---
Lucia, jeune fille de 16 ans et princesse du royaume, a vu son futur à travers un rêve étrange. Mais c'était un cauchemar bien réel d'un mariage qui continue de la hanter. Pour changer son atroce destin, elle se propose en mariage au Duc Hugo Taran, un coureur de jupon très célèbre. Cela pourra-t-il briser le destin funeste de Lucia? Ce choix la mènera-t-elle vers un destin totalement inattendu?

露西亚是王国最没存在感的第十六位公主，通过梦境她预知了自己的未来，梦里的婚姻生活简直惨不忍睹。为了改变自己的悲惨人生，她大胆地向休戈·塔兰公爵提出了契约结婚的请求，他可是王国里出了名的花花公子！两人的婚约真的能够顺利进行吗？

description.pt-br:
Lucia, a décima sexta princesa do reino, viu seu futuro através de um sonho estranho.  
Mas foi um pesadelo vívido de um casamento terrível que continua a assombrá-la.
Para mudar seu destino terrível, ela sugere um contrato de casamento com o duque Hugo Taran, um mulherengo conhecido.
Este plano poderia afastar Lucia de seu destino? Ou será que a sua escolha levará a um caminho que nem ela poderia prever?!
Baseado no romance de sucesso.

title.en: I, Who Have the Natural Charismatic Traits, Was Targeted by Yandere Disciples

altTitles.zh: 天生媚骨的我被病娇徒儿盯上了

altTitles.zh-ro: Tiansheng Meigu De Wo Bei Bing Jiao Tu Er Ding Shangle
Tiānshēng Mèigǔ De Wǒ Bèi Bìng Jiāo Tú Er Dīng Shàngle

altTitles.vi: Trời Sinh Mị Cốt, Ta Bị Đồ Nhi Yandere Để Mắt Tới

description.en: After losing all magical powers, Bing Yuanzi was caught by a female disciple with ulterior motives. Witnessing a disciple she had painstakingly raised harboring malicious intentions, the master drank the last vial of a transformative potion, intending to erase her own existence. Unexpectedly, instead of disappearing, she became the legendary natural beauty, with allure and beauty reaching maximum levels. At the same time, the next words from her female disciple sounded behind her: “Master, you wouldn’t want your loss of magical powers to be known by our enemies, would you?

“Why do you keep asking if we’re dating? We’re just holding hands, we’re not dating!!”
It’s a slice-of-life romantic comedy about couples who aren’t really couples!
description.id:
Sebuah karya baru dari author Webtoon Character Na Kang Lim

“Kenapa kamu terus tanya kalau kita pacaran? Kita cuma bergandengan tangan, kita nggak pacaran!!”

altTitles.ja: 和歌ちゃんは今日もあざとい

altTitles.en: A Hidden Side to my Crush

description.en: Tomoya is a college freshman on a mission to finally get his first ever girlfriend, but with one small problem: he's still a virgin! While he's gotten close with the beautiful and charming girl Waka Sakuraba in his club at school, he can't wrack up the courage to take the first step and ask her out. One day, Tomoya stumbles upon a hidden side to his crush Waka...
description.ja:
彼女を作ろうと意気込むDT（童貞）な大学１年生・友哉。同じサークルの癒やし系美少女・桜庭和歌と親しくなるものの、勇気が出ずなかなか第一歩を踏み出せずにいた。
そんなある日、友哉は和歌の「別の一面」を目撃してしまい…？

title.ja: Silent Witch Chinmoku no Majo no Kakushigoto

altTitles.ja: サイレント・ウィッチ 沈黙の魔女の隠しごと

description.en:
Monica Everett is revered as “The Silent Witch.” She’s the only magician in the world who can use magic without an incantation... In reality though, she’s just shy— the only reason she practiced chantless magic was so that she wouldn't have to speak in public! Before even realizing her own talent, Monica is chosen as one of the “Seven Sages,” and is assigned the secret mission of protecting the kingdom’s second prince...?

The antisocial young prodigy will have to hide her true nature while secretly rescuing the prince from encroaching danger in this thrilling fantasy story!
description.es:
Monica Everett es venerada como «La Bruja Silenciosa». Es la única maga del mundo que puede usar la magia sin conjuros... En realidad, es tímida: ¡la única razón por la que practicaba magia sin encantamientos era para no tener que hablar en público! Antes incluso de darse cuenta de su propio talento, Mónica es elegida como uno de los «Siete Sabios», ¿y se le asigna la misión secreta de proteger al segundo príncipe del reino...?

La antisocial joven prodigio tendrá que ocultar su verdadera naturaleza mientras rescata en secreto al príncipe del peligro que la acecha en esta emocionante historia de fantasía.
description.id: Keajaiban tidak membutuhkan nyanyian. Ini adalah kisah tentang penyihir terlemah, paling pemalu, namun terkuat, dan bagaimana dia dilahirkan kembali, semuanya menjadi sebuah buku. (Penyihir Keheningan) Monica Everett. Satu-satunya penyihir di dunia yang bisa menggunakan sihir diam (tanpa nyanyian), dan seorang pahlawan muda yang membunuh sendiri naga hitam legendaris itu. Tapi apa sifat aslinya?? Alasan sebenarnya saya berlatih sihir diam adalah agar saya tidak perlu berbicara di depan umum. Ketika Monica terpilih sebagai salah satu dari 7 Watchers, tanpa disadari, dia terpaksa mengambil misi rahasia untuk melindungi pangeran kedua…? Lemah dan pemalu, namun yang terkuat. Penyihir surgawi yang antisosial menyembunyikan identitas aslinya dan diam-diam membawa kejahatan ke pengadilan melawan pangeran dalam fantasi yang menyakitkan! Fantasi penyihir web, terlahir kembali menjadi sebuah buku, dengan tambahan! Apa yang akan menjadi misteri baru yang berdiri di depan Monica Everett…?

title.en: Nageki no Bourei wa Intai Shitai: Saijaku Hunter ni Yoru Saikyou Party Ikuseijutsu

altTitles.ja: 嘆きの亡霊は引退したい 〜最弱ハンターによる最強パーティ育成術〜

altTitles.en: Let this Grieving Soul Retire: Woe is the Weakling Who Leads the Strongest Party

altTitles.ko: 비탄의 망령은 은퇴하고 싶어 ~최약 헌터에 의한 최강 파티 육성술~

altTitles.zh: 叹息的亡灵好想隐退~最弱猎手的最强队伍养成术~

altTitles.zh-hk: 嘆息的亡靈好想隱退~最弱獵手的最强隊伍養成術~

altTitles.pt: O fantasma da lamentação quer se aposentar - A técnica mais forte de treinamento partidário pelos caçadores mais fracos

description.en:
The golden age of treasure hunters who seek wealth, honor, power and glory, and explore dungeons around the world without regard to the danger.  
  
"Lets be treasure hunters," said Cry Andolihy, who swore an oath with his childhood friends to become the strongest … but he discovered during his first quest that he has no talent.  
  
But that was only the beginning of his adventure.  
  
"I can't do this anymore. I want to quit."  
  
"Oh, I see. In other words, we should fight harder and cover for you, that's a good handicap."  
"Rest assured, Cry. We'll protect you!"  
"Oh, wait. If you step on that, the trap will destroy you without leaving a speck of dust behind. Be careful, Leader!"  
  
Protected by his overpowered childhood friends, sought out by newbies and nobles, they aim to be heroes and find powerful treasures.  
  
Will Cry really be able to retire safely from being a Treasure Hunter?

[Alt Official English](https://global.bookwalker.jp/series/276659/)
description.ja:
「目指すはただひとつ　世界最強の英雄だ」

幼馴染みたちと共に最強の英雄になる誓いを立てたクライだったが、早々に才能がないことに気づく。――にもかかわらず、なぜか周りからの期待だけが跳ね上がっていく日々…。そしてクライの発言によって物事はいつもトンデモない方向へ――!?
description.pt:
A idade de ouro dos caçadores de tesouros que buscam riqueza, honra, poder e glória, e exploram tesouros ao redor do mundo sem levar em conta o perigo.   
"Vamos nos tornar um caçadores de tesouros", disse Cri Andrich, que fez um juramentocom seu um amigo de infância que iria se tornar o herói mais forte, mas não tinha talento.   
No entanto, a avaliação do entorno é de alguma forma alta por algum motivo, e apenas as expectativas estão saltando todos os dias.   
Toda vez que um amigo distante da raça humana entra em fúria, subir é uma habilidade de se sentar à terra! ”Uma   
fantasia cômica popular equivocada finalmente se torna realidade  
  
  
**Link :**  
- [WN Raw](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6093en/)

description.en:
Yuan Chu transmigrated as the opposing boss in the novel, but she was wiped out by the male lead Ye Chen Yuan. Fortunately, she reincarnates once more, but back to the past, when Yuan was still young! Looking at the pitifully weak Little Yuan, she is troubled by a dilemma. Should she: 1. kill him, or 2. raise him up and openly ask for treasures from him. However, since she wants to get all sorts of treasures from him, she chooses the second option. Things don't always work out though, as she accidentally raises a sheep up to be a big bad wolf.   
  
Master? Want treasure? Let's cultivate together, but alone, just us two, then.

title.en: The Blood Princess and the Knight

altTitles.ja: 血の姫と騎士

description.en:
I, who was a sacred knight, was defeated and captured in a battle against the vampire clan.   

"Oh? Letting you die? In your dreams! Accept my embrace, and in the future, please take care of me, my lovely daughter~"   

The silver-haired Queen of the Vampire Clan lifted my chin and smiled cunningly, her sharp canines drawing closer to my neck… 

---

- [Alternative raw (Bilibili)](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28199)

altTitles.ja: 天より高く

description.en: When the Devil King announces his retirement, he calls forth his two sons, Yomi and Sora, to give them each a quest. Whichever of them finds a pure Yamato maiden within a year would inherit the throne of the Devil King, while the other would die. Thus begins Sora's sex-fuelled adventure to find a woman that can satisfy his father…

altTitles.ja: ヤッターラ

description.en: A gluttonous monster, Yattara, is drawn to a city of splendor and opulence. Its only pleasure in life: eating. It finds its favorite meal, children, and is ready to dig in as usual but then…a flash of inspiration strikes?

altTitles.ja: ブラッククローバー

altTitles.th: แบล็กโคลเวอร์

description.en:
Asta and Yuno were abandoned together at the same church, and have been inseparable since. As children, they promised that they would compete against each other to see who would become the next Emperor Magus. However, as they grew up, some differences between them became plain. Yuno was a genius with magic, with amazing power and control, while Asta could not use magic at all, and tried to make up for his lack by training physically. When they received their Grimoires at age 15, Yuno got a spectacular book with a four-leaf clover (most people receive a three-leaf-clover), while Asta received nothing at all. However, when Yuno was threatened, the truth about Asta's power was revealed, he received a five-leaf clover Grimoire, a "black clover"! Now the two friends are heading out in the world, both seeking the same goal!

---

**Links:**  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18802) (special)  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=19743) (anime)
description.fr:
Asta et Yuno ont été abandonné ensemble à la même église, et sont inséparables depuis. Enfants, ils promirent qu'ils seront en compétition pour voir qui sera le prochain Mage Empereur. Toutefois, en grandissant, quelques différences entre eux émergèrent. Yuno était un génie avec la magie avec un pouvoir et un contrôle incroyable, pendant qu'Asta ne pouvait pas du tout utiliser la magie, et essayait de compenser cela en entrainant son corps. Quand ils reçoivent leur grimoire à 15 ans, Yuno obtient ub kivre spectaculaire avec un trèfle à 4 feuilles (la plupart des gens reçoivent un trèfle à 3 feuilles), pendant qu'Asta ne reçoit rien du tout. Toutefois, quand Yuno fut menaçé, la vérité derrière le pouvoir d'Asta fut révélée. Il reçoit un grimoire avec un trèfle à 5 feuilles, un "trèfle noir" *(un "black clover")* ! Maintenant, les deux amis s'en vont vers la capitale, les deux cherchant le même objectif !

description.pl: Asta to młody chłopak, który marzy o zostaniu największym magiem w królestwie. Jest tylko jeden problem: nie potrafi używać żadnej magii. Na szczęście otrzymuje Pięciolistną Koniczynę, niesamowicie rzadką księgę czarów, dzięki której chłopak zyskuje moc niwelowania wszelkiej magii. Czy ktoś, kto nie używa magii, może zostać Imperatorem Magii, magiem nad magami? Jedno wiemy na pewno: Asta nigdy się nie podda.Portuguese (BR) / Português (BR)Em um mundo em que até as tarefas mais simples do dia a dia são feitas com o uso de magia, quem não consegue usá-la é tratado como nada! Esta é a vida de Asta, um jovem que mesmo sem um pingo de magia, sonha em se tornar o Mago Imperador, o mais forte de todos os magos! Com muito esforço e trabalho duro, será ele capaz de atingir seus objetivos e superar seu genial rival e amigo de infância, Yuno?!!
description.ru: В мире, где магия – это всё, рождается мальчик Астер, который не в состоянии использовать какую-либо магию. Ещё ребенком он был оставлен у порога бедной церкви. Сейчас ему 15, и, чтобы доказать свою силу и сдержать обещание, данное другу, он стремится стать Королём Чародеев!
description.pt-br: Em um mundo em que até as tarefas mais simples do dia a dia são feitas com o uso de magia, quem não consegue usá-la é tratado como nada! Esta é a vida de Asta, um jovem que mesmo sem um pingo de magia, sonha em se tornar o Mago Imperador, o mais forte de todos os magos! Com muito esforço e trabalho duro, será ele capaz de atingir seus objetivos e superar seu genial rival e amigo de infância, Yuno?!!

私への愛が激重の勇者様を利用して、今世こそ長生き目指します！

altTitles.zh-hk: 明明打算利用過於喜歡我的勇者大人、一定要在這一世過上長壽的一生（大概、又失敗了）

altTitles.en: Using the Hero Who Loves Me Too Much, I Plan to Live Long in This Lifetime But (I Probably Failed Again)
I'm Using the Hero Who Loves Me Too Much, Because I Planned to Live a Long Life in This World (I Probably Failed Again)

description.en:
Lisette, the daughter of an earl, is destined to be killed and eaten by a monster on her 20th birthday.
She is currently living her fourth life with all her memories intact.

In order to live longer this time, she goes to live in a sanctuary (the countryside) where monsters do not appear, but one day she reunites with Ralph, the handsome son of an aristocrat.

He is the young man whom Lisette saved when he was an orphan in her childhood.
The first words he says to her are, "I lived for you."

The first volume of a fantasy about a heroine who fights against her fate of death and a submissive, high-spec yandere hero, a devoted and doting love story!

altTitles.ja: Kyuuketsu-Hime Miyu
吸血姫 美夕

description.en:
Miyu is an eternally youthful, 13-year-old vampire. Her peculiar appearance; golden eyes, pale skin, and hair tied with a ribbon in a strange fashion, are concealed during the day. Miyu is the Guardian (or Watcher), whose duty it is to return the Shinma - god-demons that prey on humans - to the dark. She has the power to call forth fire, which burns Shinma and sends them to the dark. Her only companion, friend, and protector is Larva, a Western Shinma who is bound to serve her. Together, they hunt stray Shinma across Japan. How Miyu became a vampire is unknown, so is how and why she became the Guardian. However, more mysterious is the gift she bestows on the people she feeds from…  
  
Adapted from a 1985 OVA.

altTitles.ja: 師匠、あと49回死んでください

description.en:
When the powerless thirteenth prince became emperor, he gave his tutor, Yo Yohwa, poison. His reason being his death at the hands of his own master in countless previous lives. The poisoned Yo Yohwa then regresses to an earlier time together with the prince and is determined to get on his good side this time in order to escape. However, the prince already discovered the truth…

“This is crazy. You killed me in the previous lives, and you neglected me in another. Now you’re acting all nice. Are you trying to get away?”

title.en: Neko oji: Salaryman reincarnated as a kitten!

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

altTitles.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

description.en:
An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [KADOComi](https://comic-walker.com/detail/KC_000231_S?episodeType=first)

**Official English:** [emaqi - United States & Canada only!](https://emaqi.com/manga/neko-oji-salaryman-reincarnated-as-a-kitten/volumes)

description.en: The story of Jesus Christ told through Manga.

title.en: My In-laws Are Obsessed With Me

altTitles.en: The In-Laws Are Obsessed With Me

description.en:
My family and my husband killed me. Because of the inheritance. Returning to the past, I made up my mind.

“I have to protect my life and my inheritance.”

Grand Duke Lapireon of the cursed family. I offered him, who was not interested in property and women, a one year contract marriage. Now, all we have to do is get a divorce…

“Lady, do you think you can leave me now?”

My husband is weird.

“Would you like a land or a mine? Or an empire?”

“Sasha, did Theo do something wrong?”

“Mom, don’t leave me.”

“Sister… I can’t live without you.”

Even my in-laws began to obsess over me.

(Taken from NU)
description.ko:
가족과 남편이 나를 죽였다. 고작 유산 때문에.
과거로 돌아온 나는 내 목숨과 유산을 지키기 위해
저주받은 가문이라는 소문에 둘러싸인 라피레온 대공에게 일 년간의 계약 결혼을 제안했다.

이제 무사히 이혼만 하면 되는데……

“부인, 이제 와 날 떠날 수 있을 줄 알았어?”
조금 이상해진 남편과 심지어 시월드 전체가 내게 집착하기 시작했다.

altTitles.ja: パラレルパラダイス

altTitles.vi: Thiên đường song song tại dị giới

description.en: One day at school, Youta sees someone strange entering his school. Out of nowhere this being appears next to him and makes him fall from the 3rd floor. He lands in a strange world, where beings like dragons exist! Youta meets a young paladin, and discovers that he is the only man inhabiting that planet, and that its inhabitants are extremely 'weak' to his presence. Could this be paradise?
description.es-la: “Por favor, apareate conmigo”. En un mundo extraño, Youta Tada es atacado por una hermosa chica caballero en celo. Solamente monstruos temidos y chicas hermosas viven en este mundo.¡El único hombre es Youta Tada! ¿¡Es esto el cielo o el infierno para Youta!?
description.pt-br: Em um dia na escola Youta vê alguém estranho entrando na escola, do nada este ser aparece ao seu lado e o joga do 3º andar! Porém ele vai parar em um mundo estranho, onde seres parecidos com dragões existem! Youta conhece uma jovem paladina, e descobre que é o único homem habitando aquele planeta, e que suas habitantes são extremamente ‘fracas’ a sua presença… seria este o paraíso?!

altTitles.ja: シャドーハウス
シャドーハウス カラー版

description.en:
Faceless shadow nobles living in a vast mansion, attended by living dolls who spend much of their time cleaning up the soot endlessly emitted by their mysterious masters.  
  
Follow the story of Emilyko, a young and cheerful living doll, as she learns her duties serving as the attendant for Kate Shadow-sama. What dangers and dark secrets will she and Kate encounter, as they become more deeply involved in the inner workings of the shadows' society?
description.es:
Nobles sombras sin rostro que viven en una vasta mansión, atendidos por muñecos vivientes que pasan gran parte de su tiempo limpiando el hollín emitido por sus misteriosos maestros.  
  
Sigue la historia de Emilyko, una joven y alegre muñeca viviente, mientras aprende sus deberes como asistente de Kate Shadow-sama.
description.ja: 不思議な洋館に住む、 顔のないシャドー一族と、 世話係の“生き人形”たち。 彼らが織りなす、 摩訶不思議な日常とは…？
description.ru: Безликие теневые дворяне, живущие в огромном особняке, сопровождаемые живыми куклами, которые проводят большую часть своего времени, очищая сажу, бесконечно испускаемую их таинственными хозяевами.
description.es-la: Sombras nobres vivem em uma imensa mansão e são servidos por bonecas vivas que passam a maior parte do tempo limpando a fuligem solta pelos misteriosos mestres. Siga a história de Emilyko, uma boneca viva jovem e animada, enquanto ela aprende seus deveres como serva de Kate Shadow-sama.
description.pt-br: Sombras nobres vivem em uma imensa mansão e são servidos por bonecas vivas que passam a maior parte do tempo limpando a fuligem solta pelos misteriosos mestres. Siga a história de Emilyko, uma boneca viva jovem e animada, enquanto ela aprende seus deveres como serva de Kate Shadow-sama.

altTitles.ja: 100万ウォンのロマンス

description.en: "Will this make you happy?" Namwoo wakes up one night to find bills sprawled all over his room - along with the hazy memory of a handsome stranger. Even in his wildest dreams, all Namwoo wants is to have enough money to survive each month. Si-eon, on the other hand, has everything he could ever want except happiness. Intrigued by Namwoo's humble wishes, Si-eon offers him the money he wants - the catch being, he has to date him.

Yejun, who had always believed he was a beta, found himself unexpectedly in the throes of heat, resulting in the birth of his child during college five years ago - a consequence of his complicated relationship with Do-yoon, his unrequited first love and friends-with-benefits partner. Returning to Korea, Yejun decides to bear the sole responsibility of raising his son in secrecy, keeping the truth hidden from Do-yoon. However, five years later, Yejun crosses paths with the child’s father at his workplace - a long-overdue meeting that he had hoped to delay for as long as possible.
description.pl: Yejun, który zawsze wierzył, że jest beta, niespodziewanie znalazł się w rui, co zaowocowało narodzinami jego dziecka podczas studiów pięć lat temu - konsekwencją jego skomplikowanego związku z Do-yoon, nieodwzajemnionej pierwszej miłości i przyjaźni z korzyściami. Po powrocie do Korei Yejun postanawia wziąć na siebie całkowitą odpowiedzialność za wychowanie syna w tajemnicy, ukrywając prawdę przed Do-yoon. Jednak pięć lat później Yejun spotyka ojca dziecka w swoim miejscu pracy - spotkanie, które miał nadzieję odwlekać tak długo, jak to tylko możliwe.

title.en: My Egocentric Boss Is Obsessed With Me

description.pl: Dla chronicznie samotnego i przepracowanego Soohana, pragnienie jędrnego tyłka swojego szefa jest jego największą w przyjemnością. To smutne i żałosne, ale po długiej serii kiepskich byłych i jeszcze dłuższym okresie posuchy, przystojny i utalentowany pan Woo wydaje się o wiele bardziej gorący. Oczywiście, ma on swoje czerwone flagi, takie jak egocentryczna osobowość, dziwaczne preferencje i sadystyczna tendencja do przepracowywania swoich pracowników. Ale tak odrażające, jak te cechy, nie są wystarczające, aby powstrzymać ogromne zauroczenie Soohana - zwłaszcza, gdy mężczyzna ciągle nazywa go "babe" i poświęca mu szczególną uwagę poza biurem. Dlaczego, u licha, jego demoniczny, ale uroczy szef prosi go o wybranie pościeli do sypialni i gotuje mu ulubioną kolację, skoro nawet się nie spotykają? Choć nie chce robić sobie nadziei, Soohan nie może przestać się zastanawiać, czy jego egocentryczny szef rzeczywiście ma na jego punkcie obsesję...!

title.en: Kaijin Mira no Dai 2 Keitai ga Kawaisugiru

altTitles.en: Monster Mira's Second Form Is Way Too Cute

altTitles.ja: 怪人ミラの第2形態が可愛すぎる

altTitles.vi: Quái Nhân Mira Có Hình Thái Thứ Hai Dễ Thương Quá Đi!

description.en:
Cuteness is unbeatable!

Monster Mira is on another rampage, aiming to steal the hero's transformation belt. Having just reached full power thanks to the Doctor's modifications, Mira's new form turns out to be way too cute!

A romantic comedy where justice and evil refuse to back down!
description.vi: Dễ thương tương đương bất khả chiến bại! Quái nhân Mira lại tác oai tác quái hòng chiếm đoạt đai biến hình của người hùng. Nhờ việc được Tiến Sĩ cải tiến để tối ưu sức mạnh, Mira đã có được một hình thái mới, và hình thái này cưng vãi ò luôn!Đón đọc ngay câu chuyện romcom giữa hai thế lực thiện ác chí chóe không ai nhường ai nha!

altTitles.ja: ハンター×ハンター

description.en: Hunters are a special breed, dedicated to tracking down treasures, magical beasts, and even other men. But such pursuits require a license, and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas, amazing stores of information, and the right to call themselves Hunters.
description.fa:
هانتر‌ها، افراد کنجکاوی که به دنبال گنج‌ها، مجرم‌های خطرناک، مکان‌های ناشناخته و اسرارآمیز، جانوران افسانه‌ای و... هستند. البته برای دست یابی به این موقعیت نیاز به مجوزی است که در بین هر صدهزار نفر تنها یک نفر می‌تواند در آزمون آن موفق شود.
این داستان درمورد چهار نوجوانه که در آزمون هانترها با هم روبه‌رو می‌شوند:
گون، پسری که به دنبال پدرش می‌گردد. کیلوا، پسری که می‌خواهد زندگی جدیدی را شروع کند. لئوریو، پسری که قصد دارد پزشک شود و کوراپیکا، پسری که می‌خواهد انتقام قبیله خود‌ را بگیرد.
description.pt: Hunters são uma raça especial, dedicada a rastrear tesouros, animais mágicos, e até mesmo outros homens. Mas tais atividades requerem uma licença, e menos de um em cem mil pode passar no exame de qualificação esgotante. Aqueles que não passam tem acesso a áreas restritas, lojas de incríveis informações, bem como o direito de chamar-se de Hunters.
description.vi: Thợ Săn là những người đi chu du thế giới, đối mặt với hiểm nguy. Từ bắt giữ tội phạm cho đến nhưng cuộc thám hiểm trên các hòn đảo để tìm kho báu. Câu chuyện bắt đầu khi người cha của một cậu bé tên Gon mất tích đã khá lâu, nên cậu bé quyết định trở thành Thợ Săn với hy vọng tìm được cha mình. Khi được 12 tuổi Gon bắt đầu cuộc hành trình của mình để được tham gia vào "Cuộc thi Thợ Săn Kỳ Tài", ai cũng biết tỉ lệ thành công rất thấp, có khi chết lúc nào không hay. Trong cuộc thi cậu đã kết bạn với Kurapica, Leorio và Killua. Với tình bạn, họ đã trải qua biết bao nhiêu là thử thách, hiểm nguy trên cuộc hành trình của một người Thợ Săn... Còn về phần họ trải qua những thử thách gì và như thế nào thì mời các bạn theo dõi...
description.es-la: Sigue la historia de Gon Freecss, un joven que descubre que su padre, a quien creía muerto, es un legendario Cazador, un miembro de una élite que se especializa en localizar tesoros, bestias raras o personas peligrosas. Decidido a encontrar a su padre, Gon emprende un viaje para convertirse en Cazador. En su camino, se enfrenta a desafíos mortales y forma fuertes lazos con amigos como Killua, Leorio y Kurapika. A medida que avanza en su viaje, Gon descubre que el mundo de los Cazadores es mucho más peligroso y complejo de lo que imaginaba.
description.pt-br:
A série conta a história de Gon Freecss, um garoto de 12 anos que pretende se tornar um Hunter, um caçador de tesouros, lugares perdidos e criaturas estranhas.

Contudo, ao contrário da maioria dos Hunters que procuram fama e dinheiro, o herói da história tem uma motivação maior para querer ser um caçador – encontrar seu pai – um dos mais famosos hunters do mundo.

Mas não é qualquer um que pode se tornar um Hunter. Para poder praticar essa reconhecida profissão, é necessário ter uma licença especial – e para tirá-la é preciso passar – e sobreviver – a exames com milhares de inscritos. Uma vez aprovado e com sua licença Hunter em mãos, o caçador passa a ter direito a acessar áreas restritas, informações secretas e consegue acumular facilmente uma grande fortuna de acordo com seus feitos ? incluindo ir atrás de Hunters que usam seus poderes para objetivos escusos.

altTitles.es: El misterio del Santo Grial en la Capital Imperial  - Fate/type Redline

altTitles.en: Grail Mystery in the Imperial Capital - Fate/type Redline

description.ar: إعادة صنع لقصة حرب الكأس الإمبراطورية من مانغا كوها-إيس. يُنقل البطل إلى الماضي كي يشارك في حرب الكأس المقدسة وسط الحرب العالمية الثانية.
description.en: Remake of the Imperial Grail War from the Koha-Ace manga. The protagonist is Akagi Kanata, who gets transported 75 years to the past to participate in a Holy Grail War in the midst of World War 2.
description.es: Remake de la Guerra del Grial Imperial, manga publicado en la revista Koha-ace. Nuestro protagonista es Kanata Akagi, un chico de secundaria normal que de un día para otro es transportado 75 años al pasado para participar en una Guerra del Grial en medio del Japón de la Segunda Guerra Mundial.
description.fr: Remake de la guerre du Graal impérial tiré du manga Koha-Ace. Le protagoniste est Akagi Kanata, qui est transporté 75 ans dans le passé pour participer à une guerre du Graal en plein milieu de la Seconde Guerre mondiale.
description.pt: Remake da guerra do graal imperial do mangá Koha-Ace. O protagonista é Akagi Kanata, que é transportado 75 anos para o passado para participar de uma Guerra do Santo Graal no meio da Segunda Guerra Mundial.
description.ru: Ремейк пародийной манги KOHA-ACE GO, изображавшей Войну Святого Грааля на Дальнем Востоке в юмористическом стиле. Примечательно, что в оригинальной сюжетной линии фигурировали персонажи из cерии «Tsukihime». Благодаря магическому артефакту Акаги Каната, потомок изжившего себя магического рода, переносится в Токио 1945-го года. Ещё полыхают огни Второй мировой Войны, но в её тени происходит другая битва — Война за Святой Грааль, сражение между магами и их фамильярами, могущественными героями прошлого. Вместе с Фудзимией Цукумо, магом, которая видит в Войне Грааля свой единственный шанс, Каната призывает Слугу сильнейшего класса Сэйбер — девушку-самурая в бирюзовом хаори. Ситуация кажется безнадёжной, но возможно, именно у Канаты может оказаться ключ к тому, как закончится эта Война.

altTitles.ja: テラフォーマーズ

description.en:
With the space program attempting to travel to Mars, 21st century scientists were tasked with warming up the planet so that humans could survive on its surface. They came up with an efficient and cost effective plan of sending cockroaches and mold to the surface so that the mold would absorb the sunlight and the insect corpses would serve as a food source for the mold.  
It is now the year 2599, and the first manned ship to Mars has landed on the planet and the six crew members are ready for their mission. But what they find on Mars, is something beyond their darkest imagination and fear…

altTitles.ja: なんだコイツ!

altTitles.vi: Tên Này Bị Quái Gì Vậy!

description.en:
Kato, a first-year high school student, stands out in class because of his bad eyes and clumsy personality.

One day, when he was depressed because of false rumors, he discovered his upperclassman, Uzaki, getting involved with a delinquent.

Uzaki takes a liking to Kato, who immediately comes to his rescue, invites him to club activities, stalks him, and even shoots arrows at him to get his attention...!?

The naive love of a clumsy, stiff and addictive beauty★
description.vi: Học sinh lớp 10 Kato, vì không giỏi ăn nói cùng cặp mắt dữ dằn nên cậu bị cô lập trong lớp.Một ngày nọ, lúc cậu đang chán nản vì những tin đồn thất thiệt thì thấy đàn anh lớp trên Usaki gặp rắc rối với đám du cônUsaki rất có hảo cảm với Kato vì đã giúp mình. Anh đã mời Kato vào câu lạc bộ, theo dõi, thậm chí là bắn tên vào Kato để thu hút sự chú ý!?Tình yêu trong sáng giữa cậu nhóc trông đáng sợ nhưng vụng về cùng anh chàng xinh đẹp kì quái.
